title: A very good week in books
author: VD
content_html: The Mises Institute released The Turgot Collection in both hardcover and epub format and I finally noticed that Umberto Eco’s latest novel, il cimitero di Praga, is in the bookstores.  (Spacebunny would like to point out that she informed me two months ago; I was under the impression it was a collection of newspaper columns in the mode of la bustina di Minerva.)  The best thing about having learned Italian is that I no longer have to wait a year for the English editions to be released.
content_text:
The Mises Institute released
The Turgot Collection
in both hardcover and
epub format
and I finally noticed that Umberto Eco’s latest novel,
il cimitero di Praga
, is in the bookstores.  (Spacebunny would like to point out that she informed me two months ago; I was under the impression it was a collection of newspaper columns in the mode of
la bustina di Minerva
.)  The best thing about having learned Italian is that I no longer have to wait a year for the English editions to be released.
